title: Physics Configuration Schema
description: Schema for game physics configuration DSL

friction.description: Friction coefficient between player and surfaces. Higher values make the player slide less. Range: 0.0 - 1.0. Default: 0.75
friction.markdownDescription:
Friction coefficient between player and surfaces. Higher values make the player slide less.

**Range:** 0.0 - 1.0
**Default:** 0.75
**Examples:** 0.75, 0.5, 1.0

minForce.description: Base force multiplier for player movement. Scales with click distance. Range: > 0. Default: 1.0
minForce.markdownDescription:
Base force multiplier for player movement. Scales with click distance.

**Range:** > 0
**Default:** 1.0
**Examples:** 1.0, 0.5, 2.0

maxForce.description: Maximum force cap for far clicks. Prevents excessive force on distant clicks. Must be >= minForce. Range: > 0. Default: 3.0
maxForce.markdownDescription:
Maximum force cap for far clicks. Prevents excessive force on distant clicks. Must be >= minForce.

**Range:** > 0 (must be >= minForce)
**Default:** 3.0
**Examples:** 3.0, 2.0, 5.0

linearDamping.description: Linear damping coefficient. Reduces linear velocity over time. Higher values = more resistance to movement. Range: >= 0. Default: 0.3
linearDamping.markdownDescription:
Linear damping coefficient. Reduces linear velocity over time. Higher values = more resistance to movement.

**Range:** >= 0
**Default:** 0.3
**Examples:** 0.3, 0.0, 1.0

angularDamping.description: Angular damping coefficient. Reduces rotational velocity over time. Higher values = less spinning. Range: >= 0. Default: 0.8
angularDamping.markdownDescription:
Angular damping coefficient. Reduces rotational velocity over time. Higher values = less spinning.

**Range:** >= 0
**Default:** 0.8
**Examples:** 0.8, 0.0, 1.0

linearDamping.description: Linear damping coefficient. Reduces linear velocity over time. Range: >= 0. Default: 0.2
linearDamping.markdownDescription:
Linear damping coefficient. Reduces linear velocity over time.

**Range:** >= 0
**Default:** 0.2
**Examples:** 0.2, 0.0, 0.5

angularDamping.description: Angular damping coefficient. Reduces rotational velocity over time. Range: >= 0. Default: 0.3
angularDamping.markdownDescription:
Angular damping coefficient. Reduces rotational velocity over time.

**Range:** >= 0
**Default:** 0.3
**Examples:** 0.3, 0.0, 0.5

friction.description: Friction coefficient between block and surfaces. Range: 0.0 - 1.0. Default: 0.3
friction.markdownDescription:
Friction coefficient between block and surfaces.

**Range:** 0.0 - 1.0
**Default:** 0.3
**Examples:** 0.3, 0.0, 1.0

density.description: Density of the block. Affects mass and inertia. Higher density makes blocks harder to push but more stable. Range: > 0. Default: 0.5
density.markdownDescription:
Density of the block. Affects mass and inertia. Higher density makes blocks harder to push but more stable.

**Range:** > 0
**Default:** 0.5
**Examples:** 0.5, 0.1, 2.0
